resources.string: THIS IS PLACEHOLDER DESCRIPTION LONG TEXT, STILL ON PROGRESS.. PLEASE WAIT!
UHQA mode allows to have high performance audio when using headset at primary, switch off/on toggles UHQA to switch the amplifier for HPH path.

This module show audio module switch which can control several audio features directly from your kernel, current value in here was taken from kernel file that converted to actual value in the switch. However not all features in here will support in your device, switch will block access when it is not supported from your kernel
NOTE: Need to re-plug headset or restart audio player app when switch one of this toggles
Ultra High Quality Audio is active
Ultra High Quality Audio is not active
UHQA (Ultra High Quality Audio) is not available
Invoke class AB mode for headset path when sample rate is set to 192KHz and bit depth is set to 24, switch off/on toggles HPH to set headset path in UHQA mode.
Headset High Performance Mode is active
Headset High Performance Mode is not active
Headset High Performance feature is not available
Provide low distortion audio quality by enable/disable AB Class Mode directly on amplifier, switch off/on toggles AMP to configure low distortion mode.
Low Distortion AMP is not active
Low Distortion AMP feature is not available
Provide impedance of headphones to be able to adjust gain according to impedance, switch off/on toggles IMPEDANCE to have consistent volume level with different headphones.
Headphone Impedance Detection is not active
Headphone Impedance Detection feature is not available
NOTE: Experimental features can make problem with audio process, if you are use some service that need exclusive access like BiQuads service or other.
Qualcomm power gating features is only useful if user want to use BiQuads filter, it should save power for other users. (Active it if you want to use BiQuads)
This module show current audio state from android media services (Media Flinger) that was dump and got processed with severral algorithm to filter and show out several audio information on this app
NOTE: Value adapted when you re-open this module, this is not a static information that only load in one time
Current active android audio digital signal processing (ADSP) effects on this session, this refer to internal android ROM library which usually active when audio session or standby
Current active android audio services information which show what are services or application that use audio service on this session
